about.description: TitanBot is an advanced analytics and data visualization tool that helps users interpret transportation data quickly and efficiently.
about.purpose: Designed to provide real-time data insights and support decision-making in transportation data analysis.

features.name: Data Import
features.description: Allows users to import data in various formats, including CSV and JSON, for seamless integration.

features.name: Data Visualization
features.description: Offers customizable visualizations such as graphs and heatmaps to highlight key trends in data.

features.name: AI-Powered Insights
features.description: Generates insights from data using machine learning models, making complex analysis accessible.

faq.question: What data formats does TitanBot support?
faq.answer: TitanBot supports CSV, JSON, and other commonly used data formats for easy import.

faq.question: Can TitanBot be used on mobile devices?
faq.answer: Yes, TitanBot is mobile-friendly and accessible from any device with an internet connection.

faq.question: How can I get started with TitanBot?
faq.answer: Sign up on the website, upload your data, and explore available tools for analysis and visualization.

user_stories.title: City Transportation Authority
user_stories.summary: The City Transportation Authority used TitanBot to identify peak traffic times and optimize bus schedules.

user_stories.title: University Research Project
user_stories.summary: A research team used TitanBot to study the correlation between weather and accident rates, improving predictive analysis.
